or until desired length switch to smaller needles work 1x1 twisted rib for 2 / 5 cm knit two row bind off loosely sleeves put 48 50 54 56 60 66 70 72 74 76 sleeve sts from stitch holder or waste yarn on 16 / 40 cm main gauge needles knit across these stitches pick up and knit 8 8 8 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 sts from body at underarm place marker to indicate bor pick up 8 8 8 10 10 10 10 10 10 10 more sts from underarm join for working in the round 64 66 70 76 80 86 90 92 94 96 sleeve sts knit until sleeve measures 18 18 17 16 25 15 5 15 15 14 14 14 / 45 5 45 5 43 41 5 39 5 38 38 35 5 35 5 35 5 cm from underarm - or until desired length decrease round *k2tog repeat from * to end - 32 33 35 38 40 43 45 46 47 48 sts switch to smaller needles knit 5 row bind off loosely in pattern finishing fold the collar inwards and loosely whip-stitch the cast-on edge to the base of the ribbing being careful to keep the ribs aligned weave in ends
